title: Orbicularis Oculi muscle

# OIAN

| Muscle  | Origin | Insertion | Nerve | Action |
|------|--------|-------|----------|--------|
| [Orbicularis Oculi]({{< var ref-orbicularis-oculi.path >}}) | {{< var ref-orbicularis-oculi.origin >}} | {{< var ref-orbicularis-oculi.insertion >}} | {{< var ref-orbicularis-oculi.nerve >}} | {{< var ref-orbicularis-oculi.action >}} |

# Origin
Medial orbital margin, medial palpebral ligament, lacrimal bone @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion
Skin around margin of orbit, superior and inferior tarsal plates @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Innervation

[Facial Nerve CN VII]({{< var ref-cn7.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action
Acts as orbital sphincter (closes eyelids): Palpebral portion gently closes, orbital portion tightly closes (winking) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Clinical Significance
